availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

body.p: Hart County, Kentucky, resident. Kentuck native. Married to Thomas Hodges. Mother of Nancy Hodges, Eliza Hodges, Louisa M. Hodges, and Jacob Hodges. Resident of Hart County, Kentucky, in 1850. Resident of Hart County, Kentucky, in 1860. Employed C. C. Tharp in Hart County, Kentucky, in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Hart County, p. 188A.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Hart County, Hammonsville, p. 861.
